title: Sesame Chicken
description: Tender pieces of crispy chicken sprinkled with sesame seed in a sweet sauce.

title: Honey Chicken
description: Crispy chicken in a honey glaze sauce.

title: Szechuan Chicken
description: Minced water chestnuts, onion, mushrooms in chef's special hot peppered sauce.

title: Lemon Chicken
description: Tender chicken breaded and fried with sweet lemon sauce on the side.

title: Hunan Chicken
description: Tasty sweet and hot sauce is used to saute the tender chicken and fresh vegetables.

title: Kung Pao Chicken
description: A quick-fired traditional dish with peanuts and vegetables.

title: Five-Flavored Chicken
description: Sliced chicken sauteed with vegetables in a five-flavored sauce.

title: Cashew Chicken
description: Chicken served with crispy cashew nuts and vegetables in a sweet brown sauce.

title: Moo Goo Gai Pan
description: Sliced chicken sauteed with vegetables in a white sauce.

title: Chicken with Vegetables
description: Sliced chicken sauteed with vegetables in a brown sauce.

title: Mongolian Chicken
description: Sliced chicken with scallions, onions, and bamboo shoots sauteed with hoisin sauce.

title: Sweet & Sour Chicken
description: Deep fried chicken served with fresh made sweet and sour sauce.

title: Chicken with Broccoli
description: Sliced chicken sauteed with fresh broccoli in a white sauce.

title: Almond Chicken
description: Chicken served with crispy almonds and vegetables in a brown sauce.

title: Orange Chicken
description: Crispy chicken tossed with vegetables in a classic orange sauce.

title: Teriyaki Chicken
description: Grilled chicken breast glazed with teriyaki sauce and served with steamed vegetables.
